name: Beetrooper Formation
description: You can target 1 "Beetrooper" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but it cannot attack this turn, also you lose LP equal to its original ATK. If a face-up Insect monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Beetrooper Token" (Insect/EARTH/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). You can only use each effect of "Beetrooper Formation" once per turn.
